title: Adam Devine announces engagement to girlfriend of four years Chloe Bridges
text:
Adam Devine is an engaged man.

The actor announced on Instagram he had proposed to his girlfriend of four years, Chloe Bridges.

Chloe, 27, looked absolutely giddy as she showcased her new diamond ring while celebrating her engagement to Adam, 35, on board a small boat.

He put a ring on it! Adam Devine is engaged to his girlfriend of four years, Chloe Bridges

Adam had actually proposed to Chloe several days prior, but decided to keep the news private before finally sharing it with the world.

The actor couldn't resist cracking a few jokes now that he was finally able to announce the big news.

'She said yes! Well actually she said "ahh Adam" and then kissed me but I'm pretty sure that means YES! I love Chloe more than anything and I'm so excited to spend the rest of my life with her amazing self. You are my best friend and I'm thrilled you want to get old and wrinkly with me!

'You'll be less wrinkly. I'm gonna look like a Saint Bernard. I proposed this past weekend and wanted to keep it private for a few days but we are now ready to tell the world! Love you @chloebridges! Have fun planning the wedding. I'll be there for the cake tasting.'

All aboard the love boat! The couple couldn't stop smiling while celebrating their engagement on board a small boat

Sealed with a kiss! Chloe smooched her husband-to-be

Chloe also gushed about their special connection while announcing the big news with fans.

In the snaps, the actress nuzzled her husband-to-be while putting her stunning engagement ring on display.

'We are doing it!! I love this man with my whole heart and I am so excited to be with him forever. I've known we had a special connection since we first met (well FIRST I liked the way his butt looked in his jeans and the way he made me laugh and the fact that his backpack was monogrammed which seemed VERY adult to me five years ago) and I quickly learned that he is the kindest, funniest, most incredible man I've ever met.

Instant connection: Bridges said she knew right away there was something different about him

'I'm so proud to be his girl and will be even prouder to be his wife. Let's do this baby.'

Adam and Chloe have been dating since early 2015, after meeting while filming the horror comedy The Final Girls.

Adam is perhaps best known for his work on Workaholics, Pitch Perfect, while Chloe played Sydney Driscoll on the hit series Pretty Little Liars.
